items.title: The American Academy of Pediatrics Is Still Compromised by DEI
items.description: The result is ‘inclusion’ efforts that leave everyone feeling dissatisfied and aggrieved.

items.title: Why the Trump DOJ Must Be Forthright in Its Deportation Court Clash
items.description: The department cannot afford to lose credibility, with so much on the line.

items.title: The Unloved Iranian Revolution
items.description: The Islamic Republic of Iran is at an impasse. Its leaders cannot change; the public already has.

items.title: Corals, Opals, Marble, and Glass
items.description: Materials for all seasons at the world’s grandest art fair, plus Cleopatra and a killer ship model.

items.title: Kill the Education Department — with Legislation
items.description: The United States won the space race and sent men to walk on the moon without a federal Department of Education.
